sourcesContent:
Menssagem do Sistema:

{{modalService.menssagem}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ModalService } from '../../../Services/Modal/modal.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-modal-avisos', templateUrl: './modal-avisos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./modal-avisos.component.css'] }) export class ModalAvisosComponent { constructor(public menssagem: ModalService) { } }
